content: Finally, he can also simply hang back and toss two poison-coated daggers your way in a quick throw, requiring good reaction time to evade.

The content is as follows:
Finally, he can also simply hang back and toss two poison-coated daggers your way in a quick throw, requiring good reaction time to evade.
